description: This file defines API endpoints for managing user settings related to theme preference, including retrieving and updating theme settings for authenticated users using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy ORM.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router instance used to define and manage API routes related to settings.

classes.name: ThemeResponse
classes.description: Pydantic schema for returning theme information to clients.

classes.name: ThemeUpdateRequest
classes.description: Pydantic schema for requesting theme updates from clients.

classes.name: User
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model representing the user entity in the database.

classes.name: UserSettings
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model representing user-specific settings, including theme preferences.

methods.name: datetime _utcnow()
methods.description: Returns the current UTC time with timezone awareness.

methods.name: ThemeResponse get_theme( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: GET endpoint to retrieve the user's current theme preference.

methods.name: ThemeResponse update_theme( payload: ThemeUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: PUT endpoint to update or create the user's theme preference in the database.

ctags.name: get_theme
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: update_theme
ctags.signature: ( payload: ThemeUpdateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
